channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Faire tourner Cyberpunk 2077 sur Android : voici ce que ça donne
item.description: Équipé d'une puce Snapdragon 8 Gen 5, un terminal Android a réussi l'impossible : faire tourner Cyberpunk 2077. C'est spectaculaire, c'est instable et ça transforme votre appareil en brique brûlante en quelques minutes. Regardez comment c'est possible.

item.title: How the Altered Ending of ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Hints at Changes for Season 2
item.description: The finale of HBO's 'Game of Thrones' spin-off made a small but significant change to George R.R. Martin's 'Tales of Dunk and Egg' novella.

item.title: Falcon Northwest FragBox review: A compact gaming rig that does everything right
item.description: Mafia: The Old Country demands to be played on an enormous screen. As much as I love my 32-inch Alienware OLED gaming monitor, it doesn't do justice to Mafia's cinematic vistas of Sicily. But, I also wanted to play that game in its full 4K glory, with none of the compromises of today's game consoles. So why not just shove a tiny gaming desktop under my home theater? Enter the Fragbox, Falcon Northwest's revamped small form factor gaming PC. While it's very expensive, starting at $3,997, it's incredibly powerful and gives you the freedom to easily upgrade the hardware down the line. I know wha...

item.title: Americans are destroying Flock surveillance cameras
item.description: While some cities are moving to end their contracts with Flock over its links to ICE, others are taking matters into their own hands.

item.title: Panasonic’s 2026 TV line-up is here, and I saw it in action — but it was one of its demos of future tech that impressed me most
item.description: Panasonic launches new OLED, mini-LED, and QLED TVs, plus an impressive RGB TV

item.title: Le Nothing Phone 4a se montre avant l’heure : il sera le seul nouveau smartphone de 2026
item.description: Vous attendiez un Phone 4 ? Il faudra repasser. Nothing vient de montrer le design de son Phone 4a et de confirmer qu'aucun flagship ne sortirait en 2026. La marque préfère peaufiner son milieu de gamme et laisser le champ libre à sa nouvelle barre de LED.

item.title: If you’re looking for a portable power station to handle storm outages and camping trips, I recommend the Bluetti AC200L — it’s better than half price at under $750
item.description: Make sure you're ready for the next big storm — Bluetti AC200L portable power station is better than half price right now and under $750.

item.title: Nothing reveals the Phone 4a ahead of schedule
item.description: Nothing has been slow-dripping news about the upcoming Phone 4a for a few days now, with a promise to reveal the handset on March 5. However, the company jumped the gun a bit and just posted an actual photo of the hardware. It looks pretty nifty, even if we don't have any real-deal specs just yet. The image shows the handset from behind, displaying the company's trademark transparent design. The picture also features the redesigned Glyph Bar, which was first teased last week. This is a light-based notification system that features individually controlled mini-LEDs that light up in various ways...

item.title: Lime lance un nouveau forfait mensuel attractif et ajoute 2000 nouveaux vélos électriques compacts à sa flotte
item.description: Succès populaire selon l’opérateur américain Lime, le vélo électrique en libre-service compact LimeBike va augmenter sa flotte à 2 000 exemplaires, accompagnés d’un nouvel abonnement aux trajets à prix fixe.

item.title: OpenAI calls in the consultants for its enterprise push
item.description: OpenAI is partnering with four consulting giants in an effort to see more adoption of its OpenAI Frontier AI agent platform.

item.title: Apple’s newest AirTags are already on sale if you’re looking to upgrade
item.description: Less than a month after making their debut, Apple’s second-gen AirTags are already receiving their first discount. Right now, Costco members can buy five location trackers for $99.99 ($29 off) either online or in-store, bringing the price of each tracker down to about $20 a pop. If you don’t already belong to Costco, you can […]

item.title: Supreme Court to hear from oil and gas companies seeking to block climate change lawsuits
item.description: The lawsuits come amid a wave of legal actions in states including California, Hawaii, and New Jersey and worldwide seeking to leverage action through the courts. The Supreme Court said Monday that it will hear from oil and gas companies trying to block lawsuits seeking to hold the industry liable for billions of dollars in damage linked to climate change....

item.title: Espionnage : trois ingénieurs accusés d’avoir volé des secrets à Google au profit de l’Iran
item.description: Trois ingénieurs de la Silicon Valley risquent gros. Ils sont accusés d'avoir dérobé des secrets industriels de Google et Qualcomm au profit de l'Iran.

item.title: Xbox à la croisée des chemins : quel avenir pour le jeu vidéo chez Microsoft sous la direction d’Asha Sharma ?
item.description: Le départ précipité de Phil Spencer et de Sarah Bond laisse Xbox et Microsoft à la croisée des chemins. Quel sera l'avenir de la console de jeu américaine sous la direction d'Asha Sharma ?

item.title: Ce tout nouveau robot tondeuse Mova est déjà en promo sur Amazon et les premiers retours sont prometteurs
item.description: Mova vient de sortir un nouveau robot tondeuse, le modèle ViAX 250, pensé pour les petits jardins, avec un peu d'IA et un système sans fil que vous retrouvez à 529 euros au lieu de 579 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: ‘Frankenstein’ and ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Will Be Freed From Streaming Shackles by the Criterion Collection
item.description: The popular Netflix films are getting special feature-filled physical releases.

item.title: Dites adieu aux reflets avec les nouvelles séries de TV Panasonic QD Mini LED
item.description: Avec ses nouvelles séries de téléviseurs QD Mini LED W97C, W95C, W94C, W92C, W91C et W90C, Panasonic cible les grands salons éclairés grâce à des pics de luminosité élevés, un grand nombre de zones de gradation locale mais aussi (et surtout ?) des traitements antireflet très prometteurs.

item.title: Read Deepak Chopra’s controversial messages with Jeffrey Epstein: ‘Bring your girls’ and ‘zero in on your prey’
item.description: The alternative medicine guru turns up hundreds of times in the Epstein files from 2016 to 2019, investigative reports reveal. Author and alternative medicine guru Deepak Chopra is the latest celebrity to come under scrutiny after the Department of Justice (DOJ) released more than three million pages of files on the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein....

item.title: How to watch Atletico Madrid vs. Club Brugge online for free
item.description: How to watch the Champions League for free. Watch Atletico Madrid vs. Club Brugge in the Champions League for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Test Shark PowerDetect NeverTouch Pro 2-en-1 : l’alternative sérieuse à moins de 800 euros
item.description: Shark n’est pas encore une référence dans le monde des aspirateurs robots. Avec son PowerDetect NeverTouch Pro 2-en-1, la marque entend pourtant s’imposer comme une alternative sérieuse face aux ténors du milieu de gamme. Reste à voir s’il a les arguments pour se faire une vraie place sur ce segment.

item.title: Major Japanese semiconductor supplier hit by ransomware attack
item.description: Advantest confirms being hit by ransomware, but says investigation is currently ongoing.

item.title: Open earbuds fans: The Bose Ultra Open earbuds are on sale for their lowest price ever
item.description: The Bose Ultra Open earbuds are available, unopened, from Woot for just $179.99, beating their record low price at Amazon by $20, and slashing an impressive $119.01 off their list price.

item.title: Guide Labs debuts a new kind of interpretable LLM
item.description: The company open-sourced an 8 billion parameter LLM, Steerling-8B, trained with a new architecture designed to make its actions easily interpretable.

item.title: Ball x Pit will land on iOS and Android on March 12
item.description: Ball x Pit, a delightful roguelite that was one of our favorite games of last year, is on the way to mobile devices. The chaotic brick-breaking action is coming to iOS and Android on March 12. There will be a free trial with no ads, and you can unlock the full game with an in-app purchase. This is Ball x Pit “for your pants pocket,” according to the latest trailer. For the uninitiated, Ball x Pit is sort of a mix of Breakout and Vampire Survivors with some base building (and elements of many other genres) blended in. It’s all about finding powerful synergies between the character(s) you select...

item.title: AI Added ‘Basically Zero’ to US Economic Growth Last Year, Goldman Sachs Says
item.description: Imported chips and hardware mean the AI investemtns are translating into US GDP growth.

item.title: The housing markets with the most exposure as Trump sets 100-home cutoff for proposed institutional ‘ban’
item.description: The White House’s proposed institutional homebuying ban—which it will ask Congress to codify—includes two major exemptions. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: ‘Breaking Bad’ and ‘Game of Thrones’ fans spark IMDb review-bombing war over perfect episode rating
item.description: After a ‘Game of Thrones’ spinoff episode briefly scored a rare 10/10, ‘Breaking Bad’ fans flooded IMDb with one-star reviews. A turf war has broken out between the fandoms of Breaking Bad and Game of Thrones over the highest-rated episode spot on IMDb.

item.title: Cette mise à jour des Galaxy S22 les fait redémarrer en boucle, voici une solution
item.description: La dernière mise à jour de sécurité de Samsung tourne à la catastrophe pour certains utilisateurs de Galaxy S22. Un bug provoque des redémarrages en boucle, rendant les smartphones totalement inutilisables.

item.title: Lamborghini ditches plans for its all-electric supercar due to 'close to zero' buyer interest
item.description: Looks like we won't get to hear the powerful hum of an all-electric Lamborghini on the streets anytime soon. According to a report from The Sunday Times, Lamborghini has abandoned making a production version of the Lanzador EV concept, which was expected to hit the market in 2029. Stephen Winkelmann, chairman and CEO of Lamborghini, told The Sunday Times that there was "close to zero" interest from its customer base for battery-powered EVs. Winkelmann also revealed that the verdict to kill off the Lanzador was made late last year, but this is the first public confirmation of the decision after...

item.title: Après Sony, Panasonic s’allie à une marque chinoise pour relancer ses TV
item.description: Face à une concurrence féroce, Panasonic change de cap en 2026. Dans le sillage de Sony, la marque japonaise s'allie au géant chinois Skyworth pour sauver ses TV OLED et Mini-LED.

item.title: The creators of Dark Sky have a new weather app that shares multiple predictions
item.description: After selling their popular weather app to Apple in March 2020, where some of its core features were incorporated into Apple Weather, the creators of Dark Sky have left Apple to create yet another alternative. Their new app, called Acme Weather, embraces the fact that forecasts will never be entirely accurate by providing both a […]

item.title: This Is What a Brain Destroyed by Measles Looks Like
item.description: A new case report illustrates the deadly impact of subacute sclerosing panencephalitis, a rare complication of measles infection.

item.title: The case for embedded AI in government
item.description: Government doesn’t need another chatbot. It needs AI built into the workflows, systems, and partnerships. AI is reshaping how work gets done in institutions, both public and private. However, the impact is uneven—consumer AI chat interfaces like ChatGPT, Copilot, Claude, and Gemini are fundamentally mismatched to the realities of government work.

item.title: 'Meredith is still in Seattle': Patrick Dempsey confirms new Prime Video show Memory of a Killer will 'not' have a Grey's Anatomy crossover
item.description: Ever since Memory of a Killer burst onto the scene, fans have been hoping for a Grey's Anatomy reunion— but according to Patrick Dempsey, it'll never happen.

item.title: Les voitures électriques deviennent trop bruyantes : comment l’Europe va bientôt encadrer cette nouvelle mode
item.description: Les voitures électriques silencieuses, c'est bientôt de l'histoire ancienne. Du moins pour celles qui en ont décidé autrement. Alors que plusieurs constructeurs équipent déjà leurs modèles de haut-parleurs extérieurs diffusant des sons moteur artificiels, les instances européennes s'apprêtent à encadrer cette pratique.

item.title: ‘Dumb money’ no longer: Wall street can’t ignore growing impact of retail investors
item.description: According to data firm Vanda, retail investors accounted for $5.4 trillion in trading activity last year. For years, retail investors were dismissed by some on Wall Street as “dumb money.”That typically referred to those prone to trading on hype, or chasing trends rather than company or industry fundamentals, or responding late to big market moves.That’s no longer the case. An analysis of where retail investors put their money last year shows they outperformed two of the most popular, professionally managed index funds, SPY and QQQ, whose goal is to mirror the performance of the S&P 500 and Na...

item.title: Super Mario Bros. Wonder et ses transformations folles s’apprête à arriver sur Switch 2 avec un DLC exclusif et il est à -25% juste ici
item.description: Super Mario Bros. Wonder était une pépite de la Switch 1 et arrive sur Switch 2 le 26 mars 2026. Bien sûr, il y a son lot de nouveautés, notamment « Rendez-vous au Parc Bellabel », une sorte de DLC. Tout ça pour 59,90 euros chez E.Leclerc au lieu de 79,99 euros sur l'eShop.

item.title: This Is What Nothing’s Next ‘Transparent’ Phone Looks Like
item.description: Credit for standing out like always.

item.title: Former Xbox President Sarah Bond breaks silence after surprise exit
item.description: Former Xbox President Sarah Bond breaks silence after surprise exit

item.title: Honor tease un mystérieux smartphone et… un robot ?
item.description: En marge du MWC de Barcelone débutant le 2 mars 2026, Honor dévoile un nouveau smartphone et ce qui ressemble fort à un robot humanoïde.

item.title: Conduent data breach already one of largest in U.S. history and keeps getting worse
item.description: The Conduent data breach is bad. And it keeps getting worse.
